00010 namespace CALICE {
00017 class BoardID
00018 {
00019 public:
00020 
00023   /*  BoardID(const short crateID, const short slotID, const short boardComponentNumber, const short boardLabel)
00024       : _id(((((((crateID & 0xff)<<8) | (slotID & 0xff))<<8) | (boardComponentNumber & 0xff) ) << 8) | (boardLabel &0xff))*/
00025 
00029   BoardID() :_id(0) {
00030   }
00031 
00034   BoardID(const short crateID, const short slotID, const short boardComponentNumber)
00035     : _id(   ((((crateID & 0xff)<< 8) | (slotID & 0xff))<< 8) | (boardComponentNumber & 0xff))
00036   {
00037 #if VALUE_CHECK
00038     assert((crateID&0xffffff00)==0);
00039     assert((slotID&0xffffff00)==0);
00040     assert((boardComponentNumber&0xffffff00)==0);
00041     //assert((boardLabel&0xffffff00)==0);
00042 #endif
00043   };
00044 
00049   BoardID(const unsigned int packed_id) 
00050     : _id(packed_id)
00051   {
00052   };
00053 
00056   short getCrateID() const {
00057     return (_id >> 16);
00058   };
00059 
00062   short getSlotID() const {
00063     return (_id >> 8) & 0xff;
00064   };
00065 
00068   short getBoardComponentNumber() const {
00069     return _id   & 0xff;
00070   };
00071 
00074   //short getBoardLabel() const {
00075   //  return  _id        & 0xff;
00076   //};
00077 
00080   unsigned int id() const {return _id;};
00081 
00084   operator unsigned int() {return _id;};
00085 
00086 
00090    friend bool const operator <( const BoardID & b1, const BoardID& b2);
00091 
00093    friend bool const operator >( const BoardID & b1, const BoardID& b2);
00094 
00095 private:
00096   unsigned int _id;
00097 };

00101 inline bool const operator>(const BoardID &boardId1 , const BoardID &boardId2) {
00102 
00103   if ( boardId1.id() > boardId2.id() ) return true;
00104   else return false;
00105 }
00106 
00107 inline bool const operator<(const BoardID &boardId1 , const BoardID &boardId2) {
00108 
00109   if ( boardId1.id() < boardId2.id() ) return true;
00110   else return false;
00111 }

00113 inline std::ostream &operator <<(std::ostream &os, const BoardID &a) {
00114   os << "crate="      << std::setw(3)  << a.getCrateID()
00115      << " slot="      << std::setw(2)  << a.getSlotID() 
00116      << " component=" << std::setw(2)  << a.getBoardComponentNumber()
